headline: Xcel Energy's Monticello Nuclear Plant Receives 20-Year Extension
summary: XEL receives a 20-year license extension for Monticello Nuclear Generating plant. This supports XEL's transition to 100% carbon-free electricity.

raw.headline: Xcel Energy's Monticello Nuclear Plant Receives 20-Year Extension
raw.summary: XEL receives a 20-year license extension for Monticello Nuclear Generating plant. This supports XEL's transition to 100% carbon-free electricity.

headline: CenterPoint Energy makes preparations for first major cold snap of 2025
summary: CenterPoint Energy continues to actively monitor potentially severe cold weather projected to impact parts of the company's service territories in Texas, Louisiana, Mississippi, Indiana and Ohio over the coming days. CenterPoint has taken a series of proactive pre-winter preparedness actions to strengthen and winterize its electric and natural gas infrastructure across its multiple states, as well as inspect and test cold-weather critical equipment ahead of potential severe cold weather.
